comments.description: The text to display the comments in the feedback popup

you_havent_submitted_work_for_this_step.value: まだこのステップに答えていません。
you_havent_submitted_work_for_this_step.description: The text to show that the student hasn't submitted work for the step yet

classroomMonitor_viewProject.description: Text for link to preview project in classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_save.description: Text for save button in classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_search.description: Placeholder text for search inputs in the classroom monitor

classroomMonitor_run.description: Text displaying the ID of the current run in the classroom monitor ({0} will be replaced by ID number)

authoring_imsettings_text_required.value: 『テキスト』はデフォルトなので削除することはできません。
authoring_imsettings_text_required.description: The help text in the Idea Manager settings for the lock icon on the 'text' idea attribute.

preview_project_constraint_enabled_messa.value: ナビゲーション制約が使用されています。オフにしてプレビューするには、
preview_project_constraint_enabled_messa.description: The message shown in preview project mode when student navigation constraints are enabled.

preview_project_constraint_disabled_mess.description: The message shown in preview project mode when student navigation constraints are enabled.

out_of.description: The text to display the score in the feedback popup

you_got_a_score_of.description: The text to display the score in the feedback popup

hints_viewAll.value: 閉じる前に{0}を全部見てください。
hints_viewAll.description: The message in the hints popup that says the student must view all hints before closing the hints popup

constraint_dialog_title.value: アイテムはロックされています。
constraint_dialog_title.description: Title text for dialog alerting users about locked steps or activities (unable to visit because of navigation constraints)

constraint_allItems.description: Text to add after activity name when a constraint requires user to satisfy a requirement for all items in an activity

constraint_message_mustCompleteStepBefor.value: 次に進む前に{0}を完成してください。
constraint_message_mustCompleteStepBefor.description: The message shown to students telling them to complete work on the current step before moving on

constraint_message_mustCompleteActivityB.value: 次に進む前に{0}を完成してください。
constraint_message_mustCompleteActivityB.description: The message shown to students telling them to complete work on the current activity before moving on

constraint_message_mustCompleteStepBefor.value: 他のステップに進む前に{0}を完成してください。
constraint_message_mustCompleteStepBefor.description: The message shown to students telling them to complete work on the current step before exiting

constraint_message_mustCompleteActivityB.value: 他のステップに進む前に{0}を完成してください。
constraint_message_mustCompleteActivityB.description: The message shown to students telling them to complete work on the current activity before exiting

constraint_message_mustCompleteXBeforeVi.value: このアイテムを見る前にこちらを完成してください。
constraint_message_mustCompleteXBeforeVi.description: The message shown to students telling them to complete work on previous items before working on the selected step or activity

constraint_message_mustVisitXBeforeVisit.value: このアイテムを見る前にこちらを完成してください。
constraint_message_mustVisitXBeforeVisit.description: The message shown to students telling them to visit items before working on the selected step or activity

constraint_message_mustUnlockXBeforeVisi.value: このアイテムを見る前にこちらをアンロックしてください。
constraint_message_mustUnlockXBeforeVisi.description: The message shown to students telling them to unlock (make visitable) previous items before working on the selected step or activity

constraint_message_xMustHaveStatusY.value: {0}を{1}にしないとこのアイテムを見ることができません。
constraint_message_xMustHaveStatusY.description: The message shown to students telling them that the steps shown below must have 'statusType' set to 'statusValue' before they can work on the selected step
